name: Where is my family Demo
detailed_description:
Test the demo which contains 4 playable rooms!

The full version contains 35 playable rooms.
about_the_game:
Test the demo which contains 4 playable rooms!

The full version contains 35 playable rooms.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 1,5 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 256 MB (Shared Memory not recommended)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0b
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: openAL compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 405, AMD Radeon HD 5400 Series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0b
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: openAL compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+ (Lion)
  • Processor: 3.06 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4670
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bits
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.7+ (Lion)
  • Processor: 3.06 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4670
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bits

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
  • Processor: 1,5 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 256 MB (Shared Memory not recommended)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bits
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or higher
  • Processor: 1,5 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
